newsitem.title: USA: Cost Plus April same-store sales rose.
newsitem.headline: Cost Plus April same-store sales rose.

text.p: Cost Plus Inc said same- store sales for the four-week period ended May 3, 1997 rose 15.5 percent from the same four-week period in 1996.
Same-store sales for the thirteen-week period ended May 3, 1997 rose 7.9 percent.
Total sales for the four-week period ended May 3, 1997 were $14.1 million, a 31.8 percent rise from $10.7 million, for the four-week period ended May 4, 1996.
Year-to-date sales for the thirteen-week period ended May 3, 1997 were $48.5 million, a 24 percent increase from $39.1 million in the year ago period.
As of May 3, Cost Plus operated 60 stores compared to 50 stores as of May 4, 1996.
